alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:00PM CDT until August 06 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHELBY AND EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Leeds to Chelsea, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vestavia Hills, Trussville, Leeds, Moody, Chelsea, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, Shops of Grand River, Vandiver, Barber Motorsports Park, Greystone, Highland Lakes, Fowler Lake, Lake Purdy, Mount Laurel, Alton and Brook Highland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
